name: Dog Days (DAmieba)
description:
Developed for the GameDev.tv Community Jam 2020

Care for your dog and develop its traits of power, speed and intelligence. Train it to compete in races. Make it less derpy by playing fetch. Ascend the echelon of dog power to become the greatest of them all.

Actively in development to release as a full game. Feedback (positive or negative) is highly appreciated!
